thread.title: Social Collaboration Platforms: Why Some Initiatives Fail and Others Flourish

author: Banting, Tim
title: Social Collaboration Platforms: Why Some Initiatives Fail and Others Flourish
text: September 29, 2015 Rate this report Market Advisory Report Traditional communication silos are transforming into pervasive layers of rich collaboration; however, the successful adoption of social collaboration platforms is driven by the right mix of technology and a supportive corporate culture.
